sys_admin.name: System Administrator
sys_admin.description: Has full authority over all operations within the company.

personnel_manager.name: Personnel Manager
personnel_manager.description: Can manage company employees, add new users, or remove existing ones.

can_transfer_company_to_same_company_use.name: Company-to-user transfer within the same company
can_transfer_company_to_same_company_use.description: Can transfer funds from the company account to a user account within the same company.

can_transfer_company_to_other_company_us.name: Company-to-user transfer in another company
can_transfer_company_to_other_company_us.description: Can send funds from the company account to a user account belonging to another company.

can_transfer_company_to_other_company.name: Company-to-company transfer
can_transfer_company_to_other_company.description: Can perform direct fund transfers from one company account to another company account.

can_transfer_user_to_same_company_user.name: User-to-user transfer within the same company
can_transfer_user_to_same_company_user.description: Can send funds from a user account to another user within the same company.

can_transfer_user_to_other_company_user.name: User-to-user transfer across companies
can_transfer_user_to_other_company_user.description: Can send funds from a user account to a user belonging to a different company.

can_transfer_user_to_own_company.name: User-to-own-company transfer
can_transfer_user_to_own_company.description: Can send funds from a user account to their own company account.

can_transfer_user_to_other_company.name: User-to-company transfer across companies
can_transfer_user_to_other_company.description: Can transfer funds directly from a user account to another company account.

can_transfer_user_to_external.name: User-to-external recipient transfer
can_transfer_user_to_external.description: Can send funds from a user account to an external (non-system) recipient.

can_transfer_company_to_external.name: Company-to-external recipient transfer
can_transfer_company_to_external.description: Can send funds from the company account to an external (non-system) recipient.

can_receive_external_to_user.name: Receiving external funds to user account
can_receive_external_to_user.description: The user account can receive fund transfers from external sources.

can_receive_external_to_company.name: Receiving external funds to company account
can_receive_external_to_company.description: The company account can receive fund transfers from external sources.

immunity.name: Permission Immunity
immunity.description: A user with this privilege can have their permissions modified only by the company founder.

can_view_company_transfer_history.name: View company transfer history
can_view_company_transfer_history.description: The user can view the full transaction history of their company's financial transfers.

can_view_other_users_transfer_history.name: View other users' transfer history
can_view_other_users_transfer_history.description: The user can view the financial transaction history of other users within the same company.

can_approve_transfers.name: Incoming Transfer Approval
can_approve_transfers.description: The user can approve or reject transfers sent to the company. Approved amounts are credited to the company, while rejected transfers are refunded to the sender.

readUser.noPermissions: No permissions found for the user
readUser.noPermissionsForCompany: No permissions found for this company
readUser.error: An error occurred while retrieving user permissions

canCreateCompany.canCreate: User can create a new company
canCreateCompany.cannotCreate: User has reached the company creation limit
canCreateCompany.error: Error while checking the right to create a company

canSearchUsers.userIdAndCompanyIdRequired: User ID and Company ID are required
canSearchUsers.canSearchCompanyOnly: Can search users within the company only
canSearchUsers.error: Error while checking user search permission

canAccessSettings.userIdAndCompanyIdRequired: User ID and Company ID are required
canAccessSettings.cannotAccess: You do not have permission to access the settings page
canAccessSettings.error: Error while checking access to the settings page
